SA01vakobhku:5: VAkK_1.2 prajñāmalā sānucarābhidharmaḥ tatprāptaye yāpi ca yacca śāstram /
SA01vakobhku:7: VAkK_1.3 dharmāṇāṃ pravicayamantareṇa nāsti kleśānāṃ yata upaśāntaye 'bhyupāyaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:8: kleśaiśca bhramati bhavārṇave 'tra lokastaddhetorata uditaḥ kilaiṣa śāstrā //
SA01vakobhku:13: VAkK_1.6 pratisaṃkhyānirodho yo visaṃyogaḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
SA01vakobhku:15: VAkK_1.7 te punaḥ saṃskṛtā dharmā rūpādiskandhapañcakam /
SA01vakobhku:17: VAkK_1.8 ye sāsravā upādānaskandhāste saraṇā api /
SA01vakobhku:18: duḥkhaṃ samudayo loko dṛṣṭisthānaṃ bhavaśca te //
SA01vakobhku:21: VAkK_1.10 rūpaṃ dvidhā viṃśatidhā śabdastvaṣṭavidhaḥ rasaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:31: VAkK_1.15 caturbhyo 'nye tu saṃskāraskandhaḥ ete punastrayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:33: VAkK_1.16 vijñānaṃ prativijñaptiḥ mana āyatanaṃ ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:34: dhātavaḥ sapta ca matāḥ ṣaḍ vijñānānyatho mahaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:45: VAkK_1.22 skandheṣva saṃskṛtaṃ noktamarthāyogāt kramaḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:59: VAkK_1.29 sanidarśana eko 'tra rūpaṃ sapratighā daśa /
SA01vakobhku:61: VAkK_1.30 tridhānye kāmadhātvāptāḥ sarve rūpe caturdaśa /
SA01vakobhku:68: tau prajñāmānasī vyagrā smṛtiḥ sarvaiva mānasī //
SA01vakobhku:69: VAkK_1.34 sapta sālambanāścittadhātavaḥ ardhaṃ ca dharmataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:70: navānupāttā te cāṣṭau śabdaśca anye nava dvidhā //
SA01vakobhku:71: VAkK_1.35 spraṣṭavyaṃ dvividhaṃ śeṣā rūpiṇo nava bhautikāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:73: VAkK_1.36 chinatti chidyate caiva bāhyaṃ dhātu catuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhku:76: na śabdaḥ apratighā aṣṭau naiḥṣyandika vipākajāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:78: cakṣurvijñānadhātvoḥ syāt pṛthak lābhaḥ sahāpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:80: sabhāgaḥ tatsabhāgāśca śeṣāḥ yo na svakarmakṛt //
SA01vakobhku:81: VAkK_1.40 daśa bhāvanayā heyāḥ pañca ca antyāstrayastridhā /
SA01vakobhku:83: VAkK_1.41 cakṣuśca dharmadhātośca pradeśau dṛṣṭiḥ aṣṭadhā /
SA01vakobhku:85: VAkK_1.42 cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi sabhāgaṃ na tadāśritam /
SA01vakobhku:86: vijñānaṃ dṛśyate rūpaṃ na kilāntaritaṃ yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:93: VAkK_1.46 na kāyasyādharaṃ cakṣuḥ ūrdhvaṃ rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:94: vijñānaṃ ca asya rūpaṃ tu kāyasyobhe ca sarvataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:95: VAkK_1.47 tathā śrotraṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvameva svabhūmikam /
SA01vakobhku:97: VAkK_1.48 pañca bāhyā divijñeyāḥ nityā dharmā asaṃskṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:99: abhidharmakośabhāṣye dhātunirdeśo nāma prathamaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:100: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
SA01vakobhku:101: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:112: VAkK_2.5 cittāśrayastadvikalpaḥ sthitiḥ saṃkleśa eva ca /
SA01vakobhku:116: VAkK_2.7 duḥkhendriyamaśātā yā kāyikī vedanā sukham /
SA01vakobhku:117: śātā dhyāne tṛtīye tu caitasī sā sukhendriyam //
SA01vakobhku:118: VAkK_2.8 anyatra sā saumanasyaṃ aśātā caitasī punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:120: VAkK_2.9 dṛgbhāvanāśaikṣapathe nava trīṇi amalaṃ trayam /
SA01vakobhku:121: rūpīṇi jīvitaṃ duḥkhe sāsravāṇi dvidhā nava //
SA01vakobhku:122: VAkK_2.10 vipāko jīvitaṃ dvedhā dvādaśa antyāṣṭakādṛte /
SA01vakobhku:127: duḥkhe ca hitvā ārūpyāptaṃ sukhe cāpohya rūpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:129: nava bhavanayā pañca tvaheyānyapi na trayam //
SA01vakobhku:130: VAkK_2.14 kāmeṣvādau vipāko dve labhyate nopapādukaiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:131: teḥ ṣaḍ vā sapta vā aṣṭau vā ṣaḍ rūpeṣu ekamuttare //
SA01vakobhku:133: upekṣāṃ caiva rūpe 'ṣṭau kāme daśa navāṣṭau vā //
SA01vakobhku:134: VAkK_2.16 kramamṛtyau tu catvāri śubhe sarvatra pañca ca /
SA01vakobhku:139: saumanasyī ca duḥkhī tu saptabhiḥ strīndriyādimān //
SA01vakobhku:148: VAkK_2.23 cittaṃ caittāḥ sahāvaśyaṃ sarva saṃskṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:150: VAkK_2.24 vedanā cetanā saṃjñā cchandaḥ sparśo matiḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:153: mūladvayamahiṃsā ca vīryaṃ ca kuśale sadā //
SA01vakobhku:160: VAkK_2.29 āveṇike tvakuśale dṛṣṭiyukte ca viṃśatiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:167: prema śraddhā gurutvaṃ hrīḥ te punaḥ kāmarūpayoḥ //
SA01vakobhku:169: madaḥ svadharme raktasya paryādānaṃ tu cetasaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:178: VAkK_2.38 tridhā naśaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ aheyānāṃ dvidhā matā /
SA01vakobhku:180: VAkK_2.39 nivṛtasya ca rūpasya kāme rūpasya nāgrajā /
SA01vakobhku:189: śubhā dvivedyāniyatā ca āryasya āpyā prayogataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:190: VAkK_2.44 bodhilabhyā muneḥ na prāk catustriṃśatkṣaṇāptitaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:198: VAkK_2.48 sabhāgatā sā tu punarvipāko 'pi āptayo dvidhā /
SA01vakobhku:202: VAkK_2.50 svato 'nye kāraṇaṃ hetuḥ sahabhūrye mithaḥphalāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:204: VAkK_2.51 caittā dvau saṃvarau teṣāṃ cetaso lakṣaṇāni ca /
SA01vakobhku:220: VAkK_2.59 varttamānāḥ phalaṃ pañca gṛṇhanti dvau prayacchataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:222: VAkK_2.60 kliṣṭā vipākajāḥ śeṣāḥ prathamāryā yathākramam /
SA01vakobhku:223: vipākaṃ sarvagaṃ hitvā tau sabhāgaṃ ca śeṣajāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:225: catvāraḥ pratyayā uktāḥ hetvākhyaḥ pañca hetavaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:228: VAkK_2.63 nirudhyamāne kāritraṃ dvau hetū kurutaḥ trayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:232: VAkK_2.65 dvidhā bhūtāni taddhetuḥ bhautikasya tu pañcadhā /
SA01vakobhku:236: VAkK_2.67 kāme nava śubhāccittāccittāni aṣṭābhya eva tat /
SA01vakobhku:240: VAkK_2.69 aṣṭābhyo nivṛtaṃ tasmāt ṣaṭ tribhyo 'nivṛtaṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:241: tasmāt ṣaṭ evāmārūpye tasya nītiḥ śubhātpunaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:242: VAkK_2.70 nava cittāni tat ṣaṇṇāṃ nivṛtātsapta tattathā /
SA01vakobhku:243: caturbhyaḥ śaikṣam asmāttu pañca aśaikṣaṃ tu pañcakāt //
SA01vakobhku:248: VAkK_2.73 kliṣṭe traidhātuke lābhaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dvayoḥ śubhe /
SA01vakobhku:249: trayāṇāṃ rūpaje śaikṣe caturṇāṃ tasya śeṣite //
SA01vakobhku:250: abhidharmakośe indriyanirddeśo nāma dvitīyaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:256: VAkK_3.2 ūrdhvaṃ saptadaśasthāno rūpadhātuḥ pṛthak pṛthak /
SA01vakobhku:260: VAkK_3.4 narakādisvanāmoktā gatayaḥ pañca teṣu tāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:268: VAkK_3.8 vijñānaṃ na sthitiḥ proktaṃ catuṣkoṭi tu saṃgrahe /
SA01vakobhku:270: VAkK_3.9 caturdhā nara tiryañcaḥ nārakā upapādukāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:298: VAkK_3.23 vittiḥ prāk maithunāt tṛṣṇā bhogamaithunarāgiṇaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:300: VAkK_3.24 sa bhaviṣyat bhavaphalaṃ kurute karma tat bhavaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:304: VAkK_3.26 kleśāstrīṇi dvayaṃ karma sapta vastu phalaṃ tathā /
SA01vakobhku:306: VAkK_3.27 kleśāt kleśaḥ kriyā caiva tato vastu tataḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:308: VAkK_3.28 heturatra samutpādaḥ samutpannaḥ phalaṃ matam /
SA01vakobhku:312: VAkK_3.30 nāma tvarūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ sparśāḥ ṣaṭ saṃnipātajāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:316: VAkK_3.32 tajjāḥ ṣaḍvedanāḥ pañca kāyikī caitasī parā /
SA01vakobhku:318: VAkK_3.33 kāme svālambanāḥ sarve rūpī dvādaśagocaraḥ /
SA01vakobhku:320: VAkK_3.34 svo 'ṣṭālambanam ārūpyo dvayoḥ dhyānadvaye tu ṣaṭ /
SA01vakobhku:321: kāmāḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ caturṇā svaḥ ekasyālambanaṃ paraḥ //
SA01vakobhku:324: VAkK_3.36 uktaṃ ca vakṣyate cānyat atra tu kleśā iṣyate /
SA01vakobhku:346: VAkK_3.47 tiryak trīṇi sahasrāṇi sārdhaṃ śatacatuṣṭayam /
SA01vakobhku:351: dvīpāḥ bahiścakravāḍaḥ sapta haimāḥ sa āyasaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:356: VAkK_3.52 ābhyantaraḥ samudro 'sau triguṇaḥ sa tu pārśvataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:358: VAkK_3.53 lakṣatrayaṃ sahasrāṇi viṃśatirdve ca tatra tu /
SA01vakobhku:362: VAkK_3.55 godānīyaḥ sahasrāṇi sapta sārdhāni maṇḍalaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:363: sārdhe dve madhyamasya aṣṭau caturasraḥ kuruḥ samaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:370: VAkK_3.59 kukūlaṃ kuṇapaṃ cātha kṣuramārgādikaṃ nadī /
SA01vakobhku:379: ṣoḍaśāṣṭau sahasrāṇi catvāri dve ca nirgatāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:385: puraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma haimaṃ citratalaṃ mṛdu //
SA01vakobhku:390: VAkK_3.69 tata ūrdhva vimāneṣu devāḥ kāmabhujastu ṣaṭ /
SA01vakobhku:405: kāmināṃ rūpiṇāṃ tvādau yojanārdhaṃ tataḥ param //
SA01vakobhku:406: VAkK_3.77 ardhārdhavṛddhi ūrdhva tu parīttābhebhya āśrayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:418: VAkK_3.83 ardhaṃ pratāpane avīcāvantaḥkalpaṃ paraṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:427: dhanuḥ pañcaśatānyeṣāṃ krośo raṇyaṃ ca tanmatam //
SA01vakobhku:428: VAkK_3.88 te 'ṣṭau yojanamityāhuḥ viṃśaṃ kṣaṇaśataṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:429: tatkṣaṇaḥ te punaḥ ṣaṣṭirlavaḥ triṃśad guṇottarāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:438: VAkK_3.93 vivartate 'tha saṃvṛtta āste saṃvartate samam /
SA01vakobhku:444: VAkK_3.96 ekadvitricaturdvīpāḥ na ca dvau saha buddhavat /
SA01vakobhku:448: VAkK_3.98 ālasyātsaṃnidhiṃ kṛtvā sāgrahaiḥ kṣetrapo bhṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:450: VAkK_3.99 kalpasya śastrarogābhyāṃ durbhikṣeṇa ca nirgamaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:451: divasān sapta māsāṃśca varṣāṇi ca yathākramam //
SA01vakobhku:456: VAkK_3.102 saptāgninā adbhirekā evaṃ gate 'dbhiḥ saptake punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:458: abhidharmakośabhāṣye lokanirdeśo nāma tṛtīyaṃ kośasthānam samāptamiti /
SA01vakobhku:462: VAkK_4.1 karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:466: VAkK_4.3 na kasyacidahetoḥ syāt hetuḥ syācca vināśakaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:467: dvigrāhyaṃ syāt na cāṇau tat vāgvijñaptistu vāgdhvaniḥ //
SA01vakobhku:478: VAkK_4.9 saṃprayogeṇa tadyuktāḥ samutthā nāt kriyādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:482: VAkK_4.11 pravartakaṃ dṛṣṭiheyaṃ vijñānam ubhayaṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:485: tulyaṃ muneḥ śubhaṃ yāvat nobhayaṃ tu vipākajam //
SA01vakobhku:492: VAkK_4.16 śīlaṃ sucaritaṃ karma saṃvaraścocyate punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:506: VAkK_4.23 vijñaptyā tu punaḥ sarve kurvanto madhyayānvitāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:519: catvāryekaṃ tathā trīṇi smṛtināśo madaśca taiḥ //
SA01vakobhku:522: VAkK_4.31 sarve cet saṃvṛtā ekadeśakāryādayaḥ katham /
SA01vakobhku:523: tatpalanāt kila proktāḥ mṛdvāditvaṃ yathā manaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:525: nirvāṇaṃ ceti śaraṇaṃ yo yāti śaraṇatrayam //
SA01vakobhku:547: kurūṃśca saṃvaro 'pyevaṃ devānāṃ ca nṛṇāṃ trayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:554: VAkK_4.47 sukhavedyaṃ śubhaṃ dhyānādātṛtīyāt ataḥ param /
SA01vakobhku:560: VAkK_4.50 niyatāniyataṃ tacca niyataṃ trividhaṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:567: dṛṣṭadharmaphalaṃ tacca nikāyo hyeka eva saḥ //
SA01vakobhku:569: guṇakṣetre ca niyataṃ tatpitrorghātakaṃ ca yat //
SA01vakobhku:576: VAkK_4.58 cittakṣepo manaścitte sa ca karmavipākajaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:580: VAkK_4.60 aśubhaṃ rūpakāmāptaṃ śubhaṃ caiva yathākramam /
SA01vakobhku:583: yā cetanā dvādaśadhā karma kṛṣṇakṣayāya tat //
SA01vakobhku:584: VAkK_4.62 navame cetanā yā sā kṛṣṇaśuklakṣayāya ca /
SA01vakobhku:590: VAkK_4.65 aśubhaṃ kāyakarmādi mataṃ duścarita trayam /
SA01vakobhku:594: VAkK_4.67 aśubhāḥ ṣaḍavijñaptiḥ dvidhaikaḥ te 'pi kurvataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:604: VAkK_4.72 samaṃ prāk ca mṛtasyāsti na maulaḥ anyāśrayodayāt /
SA01vakobhku:617: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ trayo hyatra panthānaḥ sapta karma ca //
SA01vakobhku:620: VAkK_4.80 chinatti strī pumān dṛṣṭicaritaḥ so 'samanvayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:632: VAkK_4.86 lobhajaṃ kāyavākkarma mithyājīvaḥ pṛthak kṛtaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:634: VAkK_4.87 prahāṇamārge samale saphalaṃ karma pañcabhiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:636: VAkK_4.88 anāsravaṃ punaḥ śeṣaṃ tribhiravyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhku:637: catvāri dve tathā trīṇi kuśalasya śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:638: VAkK_4.89 aśubhasya śubhādyā dve trīṇi catvāryanukramam /
SA01vakobhku:639: avyākṛtasya dve trīṇi trīṇī caite śubhādayaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:643: śaikṣasya trīṇi śaikṣādyāḥ aśaikṣasya tu karmaṇaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:644: VAkK_4.92 dharmāḥ śaikṣādikā ekaṃ phalaṃ trīṇyapi ca dvayam /
SA01vakobhku:645: tābhyāmanyasya śaikṣādyā dve dve pañca phalāni ca //
SA01vakobhku:646: VAkK_4.93 trīṇi catvāri caikaṃ ca dṛggheyasya tadādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:648: VAkK_4.94 apraheyasya te tvekaṃ dve catvāri yathākramam /
SA01vakobhku:651: nākṣepike samāpattī acitte prāptayo na ca //
SA01vakobhku:654: VAkK_4.97 triṣu dvipeṣvānantarya śaṇḍhā dīnāṃ tu neṣyate /
SA01vakobhku:660: VAkK_4.100 bhikṣurdṛk carito vṛttī bhinatti anyatra bāliśān /
SA01vakobhku:662: VAkK_4.101 cakrabhedaḥ sa ca mataḥ jambūdvīpe navādibhiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:676: VAkK_4.108 bodhisattvaḥ kuto yāvat yato lakṣaṇa karmakṛt /
SA01vakobhku:679: cintāmayaṃ kalpaśate śeṣa ākṣipate hi tat //
SA01vakobhku:685: puṇyaṃ kriyātha tadvastu trayaṃ karmapathā yathā //
SA01vakobhku:690: VAkK_4.115 dātā viśiṣṭaḥ śraddhādyaiḥ satkṛtyādi dadāti ataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:692: VAkK_4.116 varṇādisampadā vastu surūpatvaṃ yaśasvi vā /
SA01vakobhku:695: agraṃ muktasya muktāya bodhisattvasya ca aṣṭamam //
SA01vakobhku:704: VAkK_4.122 dauḥśīlyamaśubhaṃ rūpaṃ śīlaṃ tadviratiḥ dvidhā /
SA01vakobhku:708: VAkK_4.124 svargāya śīlaṃ prādhānyāt visaṃyogāya bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhku:714: VAkK_4.127 sāvadyā nivṛtā hīnāḥ kliṣṭāḥ dharmāḥ śubhāmalāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:720: māno 'vidyā ca dṛṣṭiśca vicikitsā ca te punaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:727: VAkK_5.5 catvāro bhāvanāheyāḥ ta evāpratighāḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:729: VAkK_5.6 bhavāgrajāḥ kṣāntivadhya dṛggheyā eva śeṣajāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:739: VAkK_5.11 vibhavecchā na cāryasya saṃbhavanti vidhādayaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:742: vimatiḥ saha tābhiśca yāvidyāveṇikī ca yā //
SA01vakobhku:749: VAkK_5.16 na rāgastasya varjyatvāt na dveṣo 'napakārataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:754: yena yaḥ saṃprayuktastu sa tasmin saṃprayogataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:761: VAkK_5.22 ekāṃśato vyākaraṇaṃ vibhajya paripṛcchya ca /
SA01vakobhku:766: ajaiḥ sarvatra śeṣaistu sarvaiḥ sarvatra saṃyutaḥ //
SA01vakobhku:767: VAkK_5.25 sarvakālāstitā uktatvāt dvayāt sadviṣayāt phalāt /
SA01vakobhku:771: VAkK_5.27 kiṃ vighnaṃ tatkathaṃ nānyat adhvāyogaḥ tathā sataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:787: VAkK_5.35 kāme saparyavasthānāḥ kleśāḥ kāmasravo vinā /
SA01vakobhku:793: VAkK_5.38 yathoktā eva sāvidyā dvidhā dṛṣṭivivecanāt /
SA01vakobhku:794: upādānāni avidyā tu grāhikā ne ti miśritā //
SA01vakobhku:801: VAkK_5.42 ekāntākuśalaṃ yasmāt svatantraṃ cobhayaṃ yataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:816: anye ca ṣaṭkleśamalāḥ māyā śāṭhyaṃ madastathā //
SA01vakobhku:817: VAkK_5.50 pradāśa upanāhaśca vihiṃsā ceti rāgajau /
SA01vakobhku:821: VAkK_5.52 tadanye bhāvanāheyāḥ svatantrāśca tathā malāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:823: VAkK_5.53 māyā śāṭhyaṃ ca kāmādyadhyānayoḥ brahmavañcanāt /
SA01vakobhku:827: VAkK_5.55 sukhābhyāṃ saṃprayukto hi rāgaḥ dveṣo viparyayāt /
SA01vakobhku:829: VAkK_5.56 daurmanasyena kāṅkṣā anye saumanasyena kāmajāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:833: VAkK_5.58 māyā śāṭhyamatho mrakṣo middhaṃ cobhayathā madaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:843: VAkK_5.63 sakṛt kṣayaḥ visaṃyogalābhasteṣāṃ punaḥ pūnaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:846: ekā dvayoḥ kṣaye dve te tathordhvaṃ tisra eva tāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:848: tisraḥ parijñāḥ ṣaṭ kṣāntiphalaṃ jñānasya śeṣitāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:849: VAkK_5.66 anāgamyaphalaṃ sarvā dhyānānāṃ pañca vāthavā /
SA01vakobhku:851: VAkK_5.67 āryamārgasya sarvāḥ dve laukikasya anvayasya ca /
SA01vakobhku:852: dharmajñānasya tisrastu ṣaṭ tatpakṣasya pañca ca //
SA01vakobhku:856: bhāvanāsthaḥ punaḥ ṣaḍibharekayā vā dvayena vā //
SA01vakobhku:858: ekāṃ dve pañca ṣaṭ kaścijjahātyāpnoti pañca na //
SA01vakobhku:870: VAkK_6.4 yatra bhinnena tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:887: kāmāśrayā na bāhyānām ṣaḍ vidhā gaṇanādibhiḥ //
SA01vakobhku:888: VAkK_6.13 ānāpānau yataḥ kāyaḥ sattvākhyau anupāttakau /
SA01vakobhku:889: naiḥṣyandikau nādhareṇa lakṣyete manasā ca tau //
SA01vakobhku:892: VAkK_6.15 prajñā śrutādimayī anye saṃsargālambanāḥ kramaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:898: VAkK_6.18 ubhayākaraṇaṃ dharmeṇa anyairapi tu vardhanam /
SA01vakobhku:899: tebhyaḥ kṣāntiḥ dvidhā tadvat kṣāntyā dharmeṇa vardhanam //
SA01vakobhku:900: VAkK_6.19 kāmāptaduḥkhaviṣayā tvadhimātrā kṣaṇaṃ ca sā /
SA01vakobhku:906: VAkK_6.22 ādye dve parihāṇyā ca maulestatraiva satyadṛk /
SA01vakobhku:909: śiṣyagotrā nnivartya dve buddhaḥ syāt trīṇyapītaraḥ //
SA01vakobhku:912: VAkK_6.25 śrutacintāmayaṃ trīṇi karmāṇi ākṣipyate nṛṣu /
SA01vakobhku:914: VAkK_6.26 kāmaduḥkhe tato 'traiva dharmajñānaṃ tathā punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:924: VAkK_6.31 ṣoḍaśe tu phalasthau tau yatra yaḥ pratipannakaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:926: VAkK_6.32 phale phalaviśiṣṭasya lābho mārgasya nāstyataḥ /
SA01vakobhku:928: VAkK_6.33 navaprakārā doṣā hi bhūmau bhūmau tathā guṇāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:938: VAkK_6.38 sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvacyutaśca anyo bhavāgragaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:940: VAkK_6.39 punastrīṃstrividhān kṛtvā nava rūpopagāḥ smṛtāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:946: VAkK_6.42 ākīryate caturtha prāk niṣpatti kṣaṇamiśraṇāt /
SA01vakobhku:970: VAkK_6.54 brāhmaṇyaṃ brahmacakraṃ ca tadeva brahmavartanāt /
SA01vakobhku:972: VAkK_6.55 kāme trayāptiḥ antyasya triṣu nordhva hi dṛkpathaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:974: VAkK_6.56 ṣaḍarhanto matāḥ teṣāṃ pañca śraddhādhimuktijāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:978: VAkK_6.58 gotrāccaturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ phalāddhāniḥ na pūrvakāt /
SA01vakobhku:981: antyā śāsturakopyasya madhyā cānyasya tu tridhā //
SA01vakobhku:982: VAkK_6.60 mriyate na phalabhraṣṭaḥ tadakārya karoti na /
SA01vakobhku:985: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣastu ṣaṭ yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:986: VAkK_6.62 saviśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalamāpnoti vardhayan /
SA01vakobhku:987: dvau buddhau śrāvakāḥ sapta navaite navadhendriyāḥ //
SA01vakobhku:989: pudgalāḥ sapta ṣaṭ tvete dvau dvau mārgatraye yataḥ //
SA01vakobhku:998: VAkK_6.68 śraddhā vīryaṃ smṛtiḥ prajñā samādhiḥ prītyupekṣaṇe /
SA01vakobhku:1003: bhāvane darśane caiva sapta vargā yathākramam //
SA01vakobhku:1012: VAkK_6.75 mārgaśca dravyatastu dve śraddhā śīlaṃ ca nirmalāḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1013: noktā vimuktiḥ śaikṣāṅgaṃ baddhatvāt sā punardvidhā //
SA01vakobhku:1015: sāṅgaḥ saiva vimuktī dve jñānaṃ bodhiryathoditā //
SA01vakobhku:1022: abhidharmakośe mārgapudgalanirdeśo nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ kośasthānaṃ samāptamiti //
SA01vakobhku:1025: VAkK_7.1 nāmalā kṣāntayo jñānaṃ kṣayānutpādadhīrna dak /
SA01vakobhku:1026: tadanyobhayathāryā dhīḥ anyā jñānaṃ dṛśaśca ṣaṭ //
SA01vakobhku:1031: VAkK_7.4 te eva satyabhedena catvāri ete caturvidhe /
SA01vakobhku:1044: tathā ca sāṃvṛtaṃ svaiḥ svaiḥ satyākāraiścatuṣṭayam //
SA01vakobhku:1045: VAkK_7.11 tathā paramanojñānaṃ nirmalaṃ samalaṃ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1049: VAkK_7.13 dravyataḥ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ prajñākāraḥ tayā saha /
SA01vakobhku:1051: VAkK_7.14 tridhādyaṃ kuśalānyanyāni ādyaṃ sarvāsu bhūmiṣu /
SA01vakobhku:1052: dharmākhyaṃ ṣaṭsu navasu tvanvayākhyaṃ tathaiva ṣaṭ //
SA01vakobhku:1058: caturṇāṃ daśa naikasya yojyā dharmāḥ punardaśa //
SA01vakobhku:1059: VAkK_7.18 traidhātukāmalā dharmā akṛtāśca dvidhā dvidhā /
SA01vakobhku:1067: VAkK_7.22 ṣoḍaśe ṣaṭ sarāgasya vītarāgasya sapta tu /
SA01vakobhku:1073: VAkK_7.25 navānāṃ tu kṣayajñāne akopyasya daśa bhāvanā /
SA01vakobhku:1080: sthānāsthāne daśa jñānāni aṣṭau karmaphale nava //
SA01vakobhku:1081: VAkK_7.29 dhyānādyakṣādhimokṣeṣu dhātau ca pratipatsu tu /
SA01vakobhku:1082: daśa vā saṃvṛtijñānaṃ dvayoḥ ṣaṭ daśa vā kṣaye //
SA01vakobhku:1087: VAkK_7.32 vaiśāradyaṃ caturdhā tu yathādyadaśame bale /
SA01vakobhku:1093: VAkK_7.35 śiṣyasādhāraṇā anye dharmāḥ kecit pṛthagjanaiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1097: VAkK_7.37 tathaiva praṇidhijñānaṃ sarvālambaṃ tu tat tathā /
SA01vakobhku:1101: VAkK_7.39 vāṅmārgālambanā cāsau nava jñānāni sarvabhūḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1102: daśa ṣaḍvārthasaṃvit sā sarvatra anye tu sāṃvṛtam //
SA01vakobhku:1103: VAkK_7.40 kāmadhyāneṣu dharme vit vāci prathamakāmayoḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1116: iṣṭe śaikṣasya nokte tu vidye sāvidyasaṃtateḥ //
SA01vakobhku:1117: VAkK_7.47 ādyā tṛtīyā ṣaṣṭhī ca prātihāryāṇi śāsanam /
SA01vakobhku:1119: VAkK_7.48 ṛddhiḥ samādhiḥ gamanaṃ nirmāṇaṃ ca gatistridhā /
SA01vakobhku:1121: VAkK_7.49 kāmāptaṃ nirmitaṃ bāhyaṃ caturāyatanaṃ dvidhā /
SA01vakobhku:1123: VAkK_7.50 yathākramaṃ dhyānaphalaṃ dve yāvat pañca nordhvajam /
SA01vakobhku:1125: VAkK_7.51 svabhūmikena nirmāṇaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ tvadhareṇa ca /
SA01vakobhku:1127: VAkK_7.52 mṛtasyāpyastyadhiṣṭhānaṃ nāsthirasya apare tu na /
SA01vakobhku:1136: VAkK_7.56 cetojñānaṃ tu tattredhā tarkavidyākṛtaṃ ca yat /
SA01vakobhku:1155: VAkK_8.8 tṛtīye pañca tūpekṣā smṛtiḥ prajñā sukhaṃ sthitiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1157: VAkK_8.9 dravyato daśa caikaṃ ca prasrabdhi sukhamādyayoḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1159: VAkK_8.10 kliṣṭeṣva satprītisukhaṃ prasādaḥ saṃpradhīḥ smṛtiḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1162: vitarkacārau śvāsau ca sukhādi ca catuṣṭayam //
SA01vakobhku:1170: utpadyate tathā śuddhāt kliṭaṃ cāpi svabhūmikam //
SA01vakobhku:1171: VAkK_8.16 kliṣṭāt svaṃ śuddakaṃ kliṣṭaṃ evaṃ cādharaśuddhakam /
SA01vakobhku:1172: cyutau tu śuddhakāt kliṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ kliṣṭāttu nottaram //
SA01vakobhku:1175: VAkK_8.18 dve trīṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca hāna bhāgādyanantaram /
SA01vakobhku:1184: ārya cādyaṃ tridhā kecit atarka dhyānamantaram //
SA01vakobhku:1185: VAkK_8.23 tridhā aduḥkhāsukhaṃtacca mahābrahmaphalaṃ ca tat /
SA01vakobhku:1199: VAkK_8.30 upekṣālobhaḥ ākāraḥ sukhitā duḥkhitā vata /
SA01vakobhku:1201: VAkK_8.31 dhyānayormuditā anyāni ṣaṭ su kecittu pañcasu /
SA01vakobhku:1202: na taiḥ prahāṇaṃ nṛṣveva janyante tryanvito dhruvam //
SA01vakobhku:1211: VAkK_8.36 daśa kṛtsnāni alobhāṣṭau dhyāne 'ntye gocaraḥ punaḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1213: VAkK_8.37 nirodha uktaḥ vairāgyaprayogāptaṃ tu śeṣitam /
SA01vakobhku:1216: dhyānānāṃ rūpadhātau tu tābhyāṃ dharmatayāpi ca //
SA01vakobhku:1221: VAkK_8.41 nimīlite śāstari lokacakṣuṣi kṣayaṃ gate sākṣijane ca bhūyasā /
SA01vakobhku:1223: VAkK_8.42 gate 'tha śāntiṃ paramāṃ svayaṃbhuvi svayaṃbhuvaḥ śāsanadhūrdhareṣu ca /
SA01vakobhku:1225: VAkK_8.43 iti kaṇṭhagataprāṇaṃ viditvā śāsanaṃ muneḥ /
SA01vakobhku:1226: balakālaṃ malānāṃ ca na pramādyaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ //
